schema.title: Bibliographic reference concept (ELIXIR-EXCELERATE WP2 Benchmarking schemas)

_id.title: Reference ID (*)
_id.description: The unique id of the bibliographic reference. It is either its DOI or its PubMedId

oneOf.description: DOI bibliographic identifiers returned by the APIs must follow this pattern, and they do not include the revision
PubMed bibliographic identifiers returned by the APIs must follow this pattern, and they do not include the revision

bibliographic_ids.title: Bibliographic IDs (*)
bibliographic_ids.description: The recorded bibliographic ids of the referenced material, as CURIE/identifiers.org format or a bare link

items.title: Accepted IDs (*)
items.description: Currently, the accepted ids are pmid, doi and pmc

abstract.title: Reference material abstract
abstract.description: Optionally, the abstract of the referenced material

authors.title: Referenced material authors
authors.description: Optional list of authors of the referenced material

contact_id.title: Contact ID
contact_id.description: If it is a known contact, its contact id
